review: Streams a little sluggish.  Video seems to stutter and skip frames. Bought the Firestick over Roku due to their claims of speed and quality. My DVD player streams better.Maybe I got a bad one? App interface is good, playback leaves a little to be desired
author: Rick Teutsch

review: Love it works great a lot better than my Roku Lt
author: Donnie@Joanna

review: Too many limited series, (1 season or 1 show, etc), before having to pay.
author: Sara Heart

review: Awesome!! Turned my tv into a smart tv for cheap! Highly recommend!
author: Max

review: Pretty nice sleek device..does what it's supposed to once you can figure out how to get the batteries in it
author: Jonathan Ayling

review: I was very pleased with the firestick in the beginning but after only a month it freezes very bad
author: Dominiquie Celestine

review: Lovin the fire tv stick I got hulu netflix my grandkids can watch their favorite cartoons like spongebob dora and others plus I have a month of amazon prime free its all good!!!
author: t. gray
